gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 125, Pacers 99
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Pacers, 125-99. DeMar DeRozan led Chicago with 27 points and six rebounds as Nikola Vucevic (22 points, 12 rebounds) and Coby White (18 points, seven rebounds, two 3PM) totaled 40 points. Andrew Nembhard led Indiana with 18 points and five rebounds as Pascal Siakam (14 points, eight rebounds, five assists) and Tyrese Haliburton (13 points, five assists) added 27 points. The win snaps a three-game losing streak for Chicago as they move to 35-38 while Indiana falls to 41-33.
